verses.verse: Now<WG1161> faith<WG4102> is<WG2076> assurance<WG5287> of things hoped for,<WG1679> proof<WG1650> of things<WG4229> not<WG3756> seen.<WG991>
For<WG1063> by<WG1722> this,<WG3778> the elders<WG4245> obtained testimony.<WG3140>

By faith,<WG4102> we understand<WG3539> that<WG2675> the universe<WG165> has been framed<WG2675> by the word<WG4487> of God,<WG2316> so that<WG1519> what is seen<WG991> has<WG1096> not<WG3361> been made<WG1096> out of<WG1537> things which are visible.<WG5316>

By faith,<WG4102> Abel<WG6> offered<WG4374> to God<WG2316> a more excellent<WG4119> sacrifice<WG2378> than<WG3844> Cain,<WG2535> through<WG1223> which<WG3739> he had testimony<WG3140> given to him that he was<WG1511> righteous,<WG1342> God<WG2316> testifying<WG3140> with respect to<WG1909> his<WG846> gifts;<WG1435> and<WG2532> through<WG1223> it<WG846> he,<WG599> being dead, still<WG2089> speaks.<WG2980>

By faith,<WG4102> Enoch<WG1802> was taken away,<WG3346> so that<WG3361> he wouldn't<WG1492> <WG3361> see<WG1492> death,<WG2288> and<WG2532> he was<WG2147> not<WG3756> found,<WG2147> because<WG1360> God<WG2316> translated<WG3346> him.<WG846> For<WG1063> he has had testimony<WG3140> given to him that before<WG4253> his<WG846> translation<WG3331> he had been well pleasing<WG2100> to God.<WG2316>

<WG4102> Without<WG5565> faith<WG4102> it is impossible<WG102> to be well pleasing<WG2100> to him,<WG1063> for he who comes<WG4334> to God<WG2316> must<WG1163> believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> he exists,<WG2076> and<WG2532> that he is<WG2076> a rewarder<WG3406> of those who seek<WG1567> him.<WG846>

By faith,<WG4102> Noah,<WG3575> being warned about<WG4012> things<WG991> not<WG3369> yet<WG3369> seen,<WG991> moved with godly<WG5537> fear,<WG2125> prepared<WG2680> a ship<WG2787> for<WG1519> the saving<WG4991> of<WG3624> his<WG846> house,<WG3624> through<WG1223> which<WG3739> he condemned<WG2632> the world,<WG2889> and<WG2532> became<WG1096> heir<WG2818> of the righteousness<WG1343> which is according<WG2596> to faith.<WG4102>

By faith,<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> when he was called,<WG2564> obeyed<WG5219> to go out<WG1831> to<WG1519> the place<WG5117> which<WG3739> he was to<WG3195> receive<WG2983> for<WG1519> an inheritance.<WG2817> <WG2532> He went out,<WG1831> not<WG3361> knowing<WG1987> where<WG4226> he went.<WG2064>

By faith,<WG4102> he lived<WG3939> as an alien in<WG1519> the land<WG1093> of promise,<WG1860> as<WG5613> in a land<WG245> not his own,<WG2730> dwelling in<WG1722> tents,<WG4633> with<WG3326> Isaac<WG2464> and<WG2532> Jacob,<WG2384> the heirs with him<WG4789> of the same<WG846> promise.<WG1860>
For<WG1063> he looked for<WG1551> the city<WG4172> which has<WG2192> the foundations,<WG2310> whose<WG3739> builder<WG5079> and<WG2532> maker<WG1217> is God.<WG2316>

By faith,<WG4102> even<WG2532> Sarah<WG4564> herself<WG846> received<WG2983> power<WG1411> to<WG1519> conceive,<WG2602> and<WG2532> she bore a<WG2540> child<WG5088> when she was past<WG3844> <WG2540> age,<WG2244> since<WG1893> she counted<WG2233> him<WG1861> faithful<WG4103> who had promised.<WG1861>

Therefore<WG1352> as many as<WG2531> the stars of<WG575> the sky in multitude,<WG4128> and<WG2532> as<WG2531> innumerable<WG382> as<WG2531> the sand<WG285> which is<WG3588> by<WG3844> the sea<WG2281> shore,<WG5491> were fathered<WG1080> by<WG575> one<WG1520> man,<WG2532> and him<WG5023> as<WG5616> good as dead.<WG3499>

These<WG3778> all<WG3956> died<WG599> in<WG2596> faith,<WG4102> not<WG3361> having received<WG2983> the promises,<WG1860> but<WG235> having seen<WG1492> them<WG846> and<WG2532> embraced<WG782> them from afar,<WG4207> and<WG2532> having confessed<WG3670> that<WG3754> they were<WG1526> strangers<WG3581> and<WG2532> pilgrims<WG3927> on<WG1909> the earth.<WG1093>
For<WG1063> those who say<WG3004> such things<WG5108> make it clear<WG1718> that<WG3754> they are seeking<WG1934> a country of their own.<WG3968>

<WG2532> If<WG1487> indeed<WG3303> they had been thinking<WG3421> of that<WG1565> country from<WG575> which<WG3739> they went out,<WG1831> they would have had<WG2192> enough<WG302> time<WG2540> to return.<WG344>

But<WG1161> now<WG3570> they desire<WG3713> a better<WG2909> country,<WG5124> that is,<WG2076> a heavenly<WG2032> one.<WG1352> Therefore God<WG2316> is<WG1870> not<WG3756> ashamed<WG1870> of them,<WG846> to be called<WG1941> their<WG846> God,<WG2316> for<WG1063> he has prepared<WG2090> a city<WG4172> for them.<WG846>

By faith,<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> being tested,<WG3985> offered up<WG4374> Isaac.<WG2464> Yes,<WG2532> he who had gladly received<WG324> the promises<WG1860> was offering up<WG4374> his one and only son;<WG3439>
even he to<WG4314> whom<WG3739> it was said,<WG2980> <WG3754> "In<WG1722> Isaac<WG2464> will<WG2564> your<WG4671> seed<WG4690> be called;<WG2564>"

concluding<WG3049> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is able<WG1415> to raise<WG1453> up<WG1453> even<WG2532> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498> Figuratively<WG3850> speaking,<WG2532> he also did receive<WG2865> him<WG846> back from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>
By faith,<WG4102> Isaac<WG2464> blessed<WG2127> Jacob<WG2384> and<WG2532> Esau,<WG2269> even concerning<WG4012> things to come.<WG3195>

By faith,<WG4102> Jacob,<WG2384> when he was dying,<WG599> blessed<WG2127> each<WG1538> of the sons<WG5207> of Joseph,<WG2501> and<WG2532> worshiped,<WG4352> leaning on<WG1909> the top<WG206> of<WG4464> his<WG846> staff.<WG4464>

By faith,<WG4102> Joseph,<WG2501> when his end<WG5053> was near,<WG3421> made mention of<WG4012> the departure<WG1841> of the children<WG5207> of Israel;<WG2474> and<WG2532> gave instructions<WG1781> concerning<WG4012> his<WG846> bones.<WG3747>

By faith,<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he was born,<WG1080> was hidden<WG2928> for three months<WG5150> by<WG5259> his<WG846> parents,<WG3962> because<WG1360> they saw<WG1492> that he was a beautiful<WG791> child,<WG3813> and<WG2532> they were<WG5399> not<WG3756> afraid<WG5399> of<WG1297> the king<WG935>'s commandment.<WG1297>
By faith,<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he had grown<WG1096> up,<WG3173> refused<WG720> to be called<WG3004> the son<WG5207> of<WG2364> Pharaoh<WG5328>'s daughter,<WG2364>
choosing<WG138> rather<WG3123> to share ill treatment with<WG4778> God<WG2316>'s people,<WG2992> than<WG2228> to enjoy<WG2192> the pleasures<WG619> of sin<WG266> for a time;<WG4340>

accounting<WG2233> the reproach<WG3680> of Christ<WG5547> greater<WG3173> riches<WG4149> than the treasures<WG2344> of<WG1722> Egypt;<WG125> for<WG1063> he looked<WG578> to<WG1519> the reward.<WG3405>

By faith,<WG4102> he left<WG2641> Egypt,<WG125> not<WG3361> fearing<WG5399> the wrath<WG2372> of the king;<WG935> for<WG1063> he endured,<WG2594> as<WG5613> seeing<WG3708> him who is invisible.<WG517>

By faith,<WG4102> he kept<WG4160> the Passover,<WG3957> and<WG2532> the sprinkling<WG4378> of the blood,<WG2443> that the destroyer<WG3645> of the firstborn<WG4416> should not<WG3361> touch<WG2345> them.<WG846>

By faith,<WG4102> they passed through<WG1224> the<WG2281> Red<WG2063> Sea<WG2281> as<WG5613> on<WG1223> dry<WG3584> land.<WG3739> When the Egyptians<WG124> tried<WG3984> to do<WG2983> so,<WG2666> they were swallowed up.
By faith,<WG4102> the walls<WG5038> of Jericho<WG2410> fell down,<WG4098> after they had been encircled<WG2944> for<WG1909> seven<WG2033> days.<WG2250>

By faith,<WG4102> Rahab<WG4460> the prostitute,<WG4204> didn't<WG3756> perish<WG4881> with<WG4881> those who were disobedient,<WG544> having received<WG1209> the spies<WG2685> in<WG3326> peace.<WG1515>

What<WG5101> more<WG2089> shall I<WG3004> say?<WG3004> For<WG1063> the time<WG5550> would fail<WG1952> me<WG3165> if I told<WG1334> of<WG4012> Gideon,<WG1066> Barak,<WG913> Samson,<WG4546> Jephthah,<WG2422> David,<WG1138> Samuel,<WG4545> and<WG5037> the prophets;<WG4396>

who,<WG3739> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> subdued<WG2610> kingdoms,<WG932> worked<WG2038> out righteousness,<WG1343> obtained<WG2013> promises,<WG1860> stopped<WG5420> the mouths<WG4750> of lions,<WG3023>

quenched<WG4570> the power<WG1411> of fire,<WG4442> escaped<WG5343> the edge<WG4750> of the sword,<WG3162> from<WG575> weakness<WG769> were made strong,<WG1743> grew<WG1096> mighty<WG2478> in<WG1722> war,<WG4171> and caused foreign<WG245> armies<WG3925> to flee.<WG2827>

Women<WG1135> received<WG2983> their<WG846> dead<WG3498> by<WG1537> resurrection.<WG386> Others<WG243> were tortured,<WG5178> not<WG3756> accepting<WG4327> their deliverance,<WG629> that<WG2443> they might obtain<WG5177> a better<WG2909> resurrection.<WG386>
<WG1161> Others<WG2087> were<WG2983> tried<WG3984> by<WG1701> mocking<WG1701> and<WG1161> scourging,<WG3148> yes,<WG2089> moreover<WG1161> by bonds<WG1199> and<WG2532> imprisonment.<WG5438>

They were stoned.<WG3034> They were sawn apart.<WG4249> They were tempted.<WG3985> They were slain<WG5408> with<WG1722> the sword.<WG3162> They went around in<WG1722> sheep skins<WG1192> and<WG1722> in<WG1722> goat<WG122> skins;<WG1192> being destitute,<WG5302> afflicted,<WG2346> ill-treated<WG2558>

(of whom<WG3739> the world<WG2889> was<WG2258> not<WG3756> worthy<WG514>), wandering<WG4105> in<WG1722> deserts,<WG2047> mountains,<WG3735> caves,<WG4693> and<WG2532> the holes<WG3692> of the earth.<WG1093>
These<WG3778> all,<WG3956> having had testimony<WG3140> given to them through<WG1223> their faith,<WG4102> didn't<WG3756> receive<WG2865> the promise,<WG1860>

God<WG2316> having provided<WG4265> some<WG5100> better<WG2909> thing<WG5100> concerning<WG4012> us,<WG2257> so that<WG2443> apart<WG5565> from us<WG2257> they should<WG5048> not<WG3361> be made perfect.<WG5048>
